info.name: Dark Guardian
info.description: This is a stylesheet for the Guardian - UK newspaper ( http://www.guardian.co.uk ), changing the background from glaring bright white to soothing, cool black and adding a silly little phrase to each of the headlines for no reason at all. I am igor at http://techlorebyigor.blogspot.com and I code dark styles for several web sites. Wherever there is white, let us replace that with black. Note: I do not interfere with advertising. My focus here is on adjusting the brightness, nothing else.
info.additionalInfo:
This is a combination of the Dark Guardian and "With His ......" stylesheets, along with additional refinements by me.

Version 2.0 darkens the background in the Guardian's "live updates" articles.

Isy Suttie is a hottie.
